name: Event Data of the Recent Wastewater Disposal Induced Earthquakes near Musreau Lake, Alberta
description: Here are the detected event waveforms of the recent wastewater disposal induced earthquakes near Musreau Lake, Alberta. Waveform data used in this study are archived at IRIS. Our relocated earthquake catalog can be accessed in the reloc_catelog.txt.

citation.text: Li et. al., 2021. The 2018-2020 earthquakes induced by wastewater disposal near Musreau Lake, Alberta. Seismological Research Letters
